Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.friend

At a high level the Friend SDK supports the following functionality: Managing manual friends list Managing relationships with other users Friend matching/discovery via 3rd social platforms (currently limited to Facebook)

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IFriendManager
    Methods in this interface provide convenient job creation methods that provide easy access to the underlying IFriendService functionality.
    IFriendService
    This interface is consumed by the Retrofit library to provide access to the Paloma Mobile Platform Friend Service RESTful API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventFriendsListReceived
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once a previously requested list of friends is received.
    EventRelationshipsListReceived
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once a previously requested list of relationships is received.
    EventRelationshipUpdated
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once a update of a relationships is received.
    EventSocialUserCredentialsPosted
    Event published on the de.greenrobot.event.EventBus (as returned by ServiceSupport.getEventBus()) once a previously requested list of friends is received.
    Friend
    Class Friend represents the information available about a friend in the context of the Friend SDK.
    To retrieve the local user's list of friends use JobGetFriends
    JobGetFriends
    Convenience wrapper around IFriendService.getFriends(String, long, Map), request to refresh current users list of friends.
    JobGetRelationships
    Convenience wrapper around IFriendService.getRelationships(String, long, Map) to retrieve a list of local users relationships.
    JobPostSocialUserCredential
    Convenience wrapper around IFriendService.postSocialUserCredentials(String, long, SocialUserCredential, Map) request to post 3rd party service credentials to the Friend service for the purposes of friend discovery and friend matching.
    JobPutRelationship
    Convenience wrapper around IFriendService.putRelationship(String, long, long, RelationAttributes) used for friend requests, confirmations, user blocking etc.
    RelationAttributes
    Class holds information about a 1:1 relationship between 2 users.
    Relationship
    Describes a 1:1 relationship between the current user and a the reciprocal user at the other end of this relationship.
    SocialUserCredential
    Credential that identifies user to a 3rd party social service.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RelationAttributes.Trigger
    Trigger for relationship creation.
    RelationAttributes.Type
    Type of relationship.

Package com.palomamobile.android.sdk.friend Description

At a high level the Friend SDK supports the following functionality:
  • Managing manual friends list
  • Managing relationships with other users
  • Friend matching/discovery via 3rd social platforms (currently limited to Facebook)
